    CONSTRAINT [PK_Districts] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]),
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Districts_Provinces_ProvinceId] FOREIGN KEY ([ProvinceId]) REFERENCES [Provinces] ([Id]) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
